docs.snippet: A drop of more than $30,000,000 in the value of the foreign trade of the United States was disclosed in figures made public today by the Department of Commerce for the month of June in comparison with June, 1937.
docs.lead_paragraph: A drop of more than $30,000,000 in the value of the foreign trade of the United States was disclosed in figures made public today by the Department of Commerce for the month of June in comparison with June, 1937.
docs.abstract: Rept on exports to Russia, June

headline.main: EXPORTS TO RUSSIA UP 100% IN JUNE; Shipments for the Month Put at $6,630,000--Imports From Soviet Below Year Ago TRADE WITH JAPAN DROPS Sharp Increases Are Noted in Business With Several Central American Nations Exports to Russia Jump

docs.snippet: Miss Doris Stevens, chairman of the Inter-American Commission of Women, left by airplane this morning for the Dominican Republic at the invitation of President Trujillo to confer with him and other high officials of the Republic on "next steps" for...
docs.lead_paragraph: Miss Doris Stevens, chairman of the Inter-American Commission of Women, left by airplane this morning for the Dominican Republic at the invitation of President Trujillo to confer with him and other high officials of the Republic on "next steps" for the emancipation of women.
docs.abstract: Leaves for Dominican Repub to conf with Pres Trujillo on plans to enfranchise women; invited to be honor guest at inauguration of new Pres

headline.main: Doris Stevens to Meet President Trujillo On Plans to Enfranchise Dominican Women

docs.snippet: Arbitration machinery will be set up next week to settle the century-old Chaco dispute between Bolivia and Paraguay in accordance with the treaty of peace the two former enemies ratified on Wednesday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Arbitration machinery will be set up next week to settle the century-old Chaco dispute between Bolivia and Paraguay in accordance with the treaty of peace the two former enemies ratified on Wednesday.
